info.title: Qlik Engine JSON-RPC API - Generic Measure

qInfo.description:
Information about the measure.
This parameter is mandatory.

qMeasure.description:
Definition of the measure.
This parameter is mandatory.

qId.description:
Identifier of the object.
If the chosen identifier is already in use, the engine automatically sets another one.
If an identifier is not set, the engine automatically sets one.
This parameter is optional.

qType.description:
Type of the object.
This parameter is mandatory.

qGrouping.description:
Used to define a cyclic group or drill-down group.
Default value is no grouping.
This parameter is optional.

One of:
* N or GRP_NX_NONE
* H or GRP_NX_HIEARCHY
* C or GRP_NX_COLLECTION

qActiveExpression.description: Index to the active expression in a measure.

qLabelExpression.description: Optional expression used for dynamic label.

NxMetaDef.description:
Used to collect meta data.

### Properties
Semantic type with an empty structure.
